body_html:
@ymodak you might be right, though the bug in that link seemed to be OS related. Using faulthandler i got:

$ python3 -X faulthandler
Python 3.5.2 (default, Nov 23 2017, 16:37:01)
[GCC 5.4.0 20160609] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import tensorflow as tf
>>> help(tf.RunMetadata)
Fatal Python error: Segmentation fault

Current thread 0x00007f1d87090700 (most recent call first):
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/inspect.py", line 397 in classify_class_attrs
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/pydoc.py", line 210 in classify_class_attrs
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/pydoc.py", line 1276 in docclass
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/pydoc.py", line 375 in document
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/pydoc.py", line 1632 in render_doc
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/pydoc.py", line 1639 in doc
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/pydoc.py", line 1905 in help
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/pydoc.py", line 1852 in __call__
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/_sitebuiltins.py", line 103 in __call__
  File "<stdin>", line 1 in <module>
Segmentation fault (core dumped)

body:
@ymodak you might be right, though the bug in that link seemed to be OS related. Using `faulthandler` i got:

```
$ python3 -X faulthandler
Python 3.5.2 (default, Nov 23 2017, 16:37:01)
[GCC 5.4.0 20160609] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import tensorflow as tf
>>> help(tf.RunMetadata)
Fatal Python error: Segmentation fault

Current thread 0x00007f1d87090700 (most recent call first):
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/inspect.py", line 397 in classify_class_attrs
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/pydoc.py", line 210 in classify_class_attrs
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/pydoc.py", line 1276 in docclass
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/pydoc.py", line 375 in document
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/pydoc.py", line 1632 in render_doc
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/pydoc.py", line 1639 in doc
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/pydoc.py", line 1905 in help
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/pydoc.py", line 1852 in __call__
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/_sitebuiltins.py", line 103 in __call__
  File "<stdin>", line 1 in <module>
Segmentation fault (core dumped)
```
